storyInfo: Working hand in hand, Ch'en and the gang defeat Pancho. What Candela does next leaves everyone shocked.

attributes.content: Hey, look. That's Ch'en and Lin they're chasing, right?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Impressive. Really impressive.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: We should go help—
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Suddenly, a loud explosion echoes from the ship, not far from the shore.
What did you do?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: A little surprise.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Remember how I asked you what to do after the hostages are rescued?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I did agree with you that I should take everyone with me and leave, but then it came to me I still had that bomb.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: So I thought I'd give them a little surprise.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Care for a drink?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Interesting time for such a display of aesthetics.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I didn't notice this until I got the boat out here. Figured I'd try my hand at arranging it.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Sounds lame.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Talking about yourself?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I can't tell for sure whether you did that intentionally or not.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Have you forgotten already? 'When it comes time for you to take over, you can't always do as they did in the past.'
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The call was still connected when you said that.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: So, be straight with me. You didn't do what I think you did, right?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We're almost to the shore.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You lost, old man.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You have no idea what you've done, helping Candela.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: You've done well, Pancho.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Candela!
attributes.name: Captain's Subordinate

attributes.content: Stop. We lost.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Good choice.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Come, sit.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: What are you trying to do, Candela?
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Can't you tell? I'm inviting you to eat with me.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Pancho snorts, but sits down opposite to Candela nonetheless.
Most men would be terrified at this point. That's what I like about you, Pancho.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: You flatter me.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: I lost, but not only have you not arrested me, you're asking me out to eat. What are you trying to do? Humiliate me?
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: I want a chat, Pancho.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: You used Ernesto to distract me, and you had your underlings plant bombs all over the city during the competition.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Finally, right before the third round was to begin, you took all the elites and dignitaries on the ship hostage to keep me from doing anything.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I've got to hand it to you, Pancho. This is the closest I've come to losing my city.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Concha tu madre, Candela. My men and I spent days on end to put this plan in motion.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Then, it so happens you invited two outsiders who don't know the slightest thing about this city here, and it so happens they took on this case for you.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: And they... They happen to thwart my plans!!
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Why did you, of all people, win?!
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: I won?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: What are you talking about? Dear Pancho, I think you've spent so much time in my city that you've forgotten who I am.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Or perhaps you never understood me at all.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I was never your opponent, and you didn't lose to me.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: You merely failed. It's that simple.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: You lived in the city you despise the most for decades, complaining about the three governments, yet you accepted the backing of one of them just to overthrow me.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Let me guess. It's probably someone from the Leithanian side. Oh, I even have a good idea who it might be.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Tell me, Pancho. What was going on in your mind that you turned to those ruthless men for help?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Oh, so you've learned to swallow your pride.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: In that case, why not wag your tail at me and beg for my mercy?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: How are you so sure I wouldn't help you?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I mean it, Pancho. If you had come begging, perhaps I would've given you the manpower and money to fight the wars you so love.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: And if you then managed to win, this city would have to bow down to you.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: You couldn't find a more attractive plan if you tried.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I will never bow down to you.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Oh, look at you. You're always so stubborn.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Men like you always have unrealistic expectations of the words 'complete' and 'independence'.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: You dream of an ideology that will bring all of you together. You seek a symbol that will unite all of you under its banner.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: But the truth is Bolívar has never been independent. It has no history, so where will you find your ideology and symbol?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Suppose you succeeded, would the Bolívar you go on to forge really be the Bolívar you've always dreamt of? Somehow I doubt it.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: It doesn't matter what you say. All I've ever wanted is an end to the war, for peace to be restored to Bolívar.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: I lost. I accept defeat, Candela.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: My undertaking may not be righteous, but, at the very least, I am more righteous than you are!
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Oh, pardon. Look at me, I confused you with the men behind you.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: You are not the kind of man I described. You wish to save this country from the bottom of your heart, and that earned you this seat right now.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: However, you must be punished for your failure, so I will treat you as their leader nonetheless. Makes things easier that way.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I've never thought myself righteous, dear old Pancho.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I don't care what the three governments are doing, and I certainly don't care about your Bolívar.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: You say I'm obsessed with this city, but you're wrong. I don't care about this city.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: What I care about is the meaning that this city represents.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Meaning? You call wasting your life away on entertainment meaning?
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: *Sigh*, look at how stubborn you are. You will never understand what money represents.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Okay, take this old bastard away. I will talk to him some other time.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: If you come across anyone trying to resist, you know what to do.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Yes, ma'am.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Wow, I bet not even the Hung-mên Banquet was this intense.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Just watching them was enough to give me creeps.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: That was about as suffocating to watch as watching my father and grandpa having dinner together.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Agreed.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hoshiguma?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Swire?!
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Hey there.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Look at you two. You're drenched. Get a towel and dry yourselves.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: What are you doing here?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hahaha, it's a long story. We'll talk about it over dinner.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Eh, I'm not sure I'm in the mood for dinner after all this.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Oh, my girls, look at me chattering away with Pancho, leaving my heroes of the day out in the cold.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Hey, you over there, get two drones over here right now. Lighting, too.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: That was beautiful from the two of you. Simply beautiful.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I have to thank Wei Yenwu for introducing me to such fine examples of the younger generation.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: And you contributed a wonderful, unparalleled ending to this championship.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Championship? Ending?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's right. If nothing goes wrong, I am guessing a lot of people are sitting in front of their TVs, watching us.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Although we didn't get footage of everything that transpired inside the ship, I am sure the sight of you taking on Pancho on the deck has left a deep impression.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Everyone must be cheering for you two right about now.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: You once told me that as long as you're here, no one can threaten this city.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Yes, I did. What of it?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: You don't consider everything that just happened a threat?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hahaha, my little Ch'en, you are still far too young.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: What constitutes a threat? Is it the city getting leveled? Is it seeing its entire population massacred?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: No, those are hardly threats, Ch'en.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: The real threat is the city's people losing their desires, never to seek enjoyment again.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: But you've been a policewoman for a great number of years. Do you think that's possible?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Oh, the look on your face tells me what you think.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: You see. You know it yourself. The answer is that it's not possible.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: And as long as that remains the answer, this city will continue to exist. And if Dossoles falls, Tressoles will rise in its place.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: However many cities you need, I can build.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Nonetheless, that doesn't erase the fact that you two are heroes to this city.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Oh, look at me. How forgetful I am.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Is the party ready yet?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: For the most part.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Now where's my mic... Oh, there we are.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Ahem, my dear citizens and tourists. Whether you are sitting in front of a TV or watching from the beach...
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: It gives me great pleasure to announce to you the final victors of this year's Dossoles Warrior Champion, as well as the heroes that saved our city.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Our heroines from Lungmen—Ch'en Hui-chieh and Lin Yühsia!
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Let us also thank Pancho for taking it upon himself to give us such a grand performance!
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Now, we'll be throwing a party on the beach. Everyone is welcome!
attributes.name: Candela
